item.title: Flight Data Recorder (FDR) System FDR Recording – Parameters required by FAR

numlitem.para: Cockpit Voice Recorder (CVR) is operative, and
Repairs are made within 20 calendar days.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "FLIGHT RCDR SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
